intermediate.translation[0].definitions[: an intermediate class, course etc is at a level of knowledge or skill that is between the basic level and the advanced level
a book aimed at students at the intermediate level and above
intermediate students, sports players etc have reached a level of knowledge or skill that is between the basic level and the advanced level
an intermediate stage in a process of development is between two other stages
an intermediate stage during which the disease is dormant
intermediate.translation[1].definitions[: a student, sports player etc who has reached a level of knowledge or skill that is between the basic level and the advanced level
a ski resort suited to beginners and intermediates
